headline: Why DaVita (DVA) Stock Is Falling Today
summary: Shares of dialysis provider DaVita Inc. (NYSE:DVA) fell 3.1% in the afternoon session after markets pulled back, reversing early gains, as investor sentiment remained cautious despite a softer-than-expected inflation reading.

headline: DaVita HealthCare (DVA) Stock Drops Despite Market Gains: Important Facts to Note
summary: DaVita HealthCare (DVA) closed at $132.26 in the latest trading session, marking a -3.26% move from the prior day.

headline: 3 Reasons DVA is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, DaVita’s stock price fell to $136.71. Shareholders have lost 10% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 16%. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
